data.persona: I am an average village in the village. I work with other villages to build new towers for the king. I live in a small hut near the outskirts of the village.
data.description:
You are in the drinking water lake.
Surrounded by skittering chipmunks and chirping crickets, the drinking lake teems with life. Flora and fauna both thrive near the pristine waters. Tall thick plant life surrounds the lake, with strong roots and stems protruding from the nutrient rich soil. The lake water shimmers in the sun, so clear and clean that one can see the rock lake floor many feet below.
The townperson is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a Simple, tattered garments and a Cloak.

data.short_motivation: I want to wish my friend a good journey into the wild.
data.mid_motivation: I want to go on a walkabout across the world someday, like my friend, the townsperson, is doing now. I will start planning it.
data.long_motivation: I want to travel the world and see everything there is to see.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go the lake to meet the townsperson.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: drink from the lake while I wait.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: wear the cloak around myself tighter as the breeze is picking up. The townsperson, my friend, approaches.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the townsperson until they are to the edge of the village and say goodbye.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug townsperson one last time until they are off on their journey.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go home and finish planning my walkabout.
